member.name: T:VslangProj90.pkgOptionInfer
member.summary: Determines whether local type inference in declaring variables is used in the package.

member.name: F:VslangProj90.pkgOptionInfer.pkgOptionInferOff
member.summary: Disables local type inference in the package.

member.name: F:VslangProj90.pkgOptionInfer.pkgOptionInferOn
member.summary: Enables local type inference in the package.

member.name: T:VslangProj90.prjApplicationManifestValues
member.summary: An enumeration representing the presence of the app.manifest file.

member.name: F:VslangProj90.prjApplicationManifestValues.prjApplicationManifest_Default
member.summary: An enumeration value indicating that the application is using the default app.manifest file.

member.name: F:VslangProj90.prjApplicationManifestValues.prjApplicationManifest_NoManifest
member.summary: An enumeration value indicating that the application has no app.manifest file.

member.name: T:VslangProj90.prjOptionInfer
member.summary: Determines whether local type inference in declaring variables is used in the project.

member.name: F:VslangProj90.prjOptionInfer.prjOptionInferOff
member.summary: Disables local type inference for the project.

member.name: F:VslangProj90.prjOptionInfer.prjOptionInferOn
member.summary: Enables local type inference for the project.

member.name: T:VslangProj90.VBPackageSettings2
member.summary: Represents the setting for Option Infer. Applies to Visual Basic only.

member.name: T:VslangProj90.VBProjPropId90
member.summary: An enumeration that controls options in the Code Analysis page for Visual Basic projects. Applies to Visual Basic only.

member.name: F:VslangProj90.VBProjPropId90.VBPROJPROPID_OptionInfer
member.summary: Indicates whether local type inference in declaring variables is used in the project.

member.name: F:VslangProj90.VBProjPropId90.VBPROJPROPID_CodeAnalysisIgnoreGeneratedCode
member.summary: Indicates whether Code Analysis should fail silently when it analyzes invalid assemblies, such as those without managed code. The default value is true.

member.name: F:VslangProj90.VBProjPropId90.VBPROJPROPID_CodeAnalysisOverrideRuleVisibilities
member.summary: Indicates whether to run all overridable Code Analysis rules against all targets. This will cause specific rules, such as those within the Design and Naming categories, to run against both public and internal APIs instead of only public APIs. The default value is false.

member.name: F:VslangProj90.VBProjPropId90.VBPROJPROPID_CodeAnalysisCulture
member.summary: The Culture to use for Code Analysis spelling rules, such as "en-US" or "en-AU". The default value is the current user interface language for Windows.

member.name: F:VslangProj90.VBProjPropId90.VBPROJPROPID_CodeAnalysisDictionaries
member.summary: Indicates the dictionaries used by Code Analysis.

member.name: T:VslangProj90.VsProjPropId90
member.summary: An enumeration representing project properties for all Visual Studio projects.

member.name: F:VslangProj90.VsProjPropId90.VBPROJPROPID_TargetFramework
member.summary: The version of the .NET Framework targeted by the project.

member.name: F:VslangProj90.VsProjPropId90.VBPROJPROPID_ApplicationManifest
member.summary: The app.manifest file used by the project.

member.name: F:VslangProj90.VsProjPropId90.VBPROJPROPID_TargetFrameworkSubset
member.summary: The version of the .NET Framework subset targeted by the project.
